author: dblevins
msg: Refactoring the ENCReference.  Will be adding better support for getting references from other namespaces.  This will be used for a cleaner integration with TyRex.

author: dblevins
msg: Regenerated the Castor XML objects for loading in the configuration.

author: dblevins
msg: New files for running the test suite against InstantDB and PostgreSQL.

author: dblevins
msg: Serious over-hall of the Test Suite.
You can now "unplug" the database you are testing against and plug in another test database.
I have a PostgreSQL test database working with all the test suite except for the CMP test which
fail due to an issue with Castor. When I get that cleared up, I check it in too. Then we can run
our test suite on a regular basis against InstantDB and PostgreSQL.
Anyone want to invest the time to get the test suite running against MySQL or Oracle?
Anyone want to donate an Oracle license to the project?
